column5: Did some late winter / early spring mods to my 2009 16' prosport and now I'm in need for a small amount of matching flooring.  Given the small amount I need (15' sq.ft) I'm hoping not to drive multiple hours, any suggestions?
Check with the local marine supply stores in the area down by the lake.

Henry Ngyuyen works for Legend (Barrie area) and is a member of this board - send him a PM or call him at this number  I have a 2010 Pro sport and have some plans as well for deck extensions - let me know what you find out please!  Legend Boats 1 (705) 431-9622
